text: Vigilio Mario Olmi (14 August 1927 â€“ 25 January 2019) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He was born in Coccaglio, Italy. Olmi was ordained to the priesthood in 1950. He was titular bishop of Gunugus and was auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Brescia, Italy, from 1986 to 2003.Vigilio Mario Olmi Olmi died on 25 January 2019 in Brescia, Italy at the age of 91.Bishop Vigilio Mario Olmi == References == Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Lombardy
title: Vigilio Mario Olmi
